Package com.google.android.exoplayer2

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ControlDispatcher
    Dispatches operations to the Player.
    ExoPlayer
    An extensible media player that plays MediaSources.
    ExoPlayer.EventListener Deprecated
    Use Player.EventListener instead.
    ExoPlayer.ExoPlayerComponent
    A component of an ExoPlayer that can receive messages on the playback thread.
    LoadControl
    Controls buffering of media.
    Player
    A media player interface defining traditional high-level functionality, such as the ability to play, pause, seek and query properties of the currently playing media.
    Player.EventListener
    Listener of changes in player state.
    Renderer
    Renders media read from a SampleStream.
    RendererCapabilities
    Defines the capabilities of a Renderer.
    RenderersFactory
    Builds Renderer instances for use by a SimpleExoPlayer.
    SimpleExoPlayer.VideoListener
    A listener for video rendering information from a SimpleExoPlayer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseRenderer
    An abstract base class suitable for most Renderer implementations.
    BuildConfig  
    C
    Defines constants used by the library.
    CTest
    Unit test for C.
    DefaultControlDispatcher
    Default ControlDispatcher that dispatches all operations to the player without modification.
    DefaultLoadControl
    The default LoadControl implementation.
    DefaultRenderersFactory
    Default RenderersFactory implementation.
    ExoPlayer.ExoPlayerMessage
    Defines a message and a target ExoPlayer.ExoPlayerComponent to receive it.
    ExoPlayerFactory
    A factory for ExoPlayer instances.
    ExoPlayerImpl
    An ExoPlayer implementation.
    ExoPlayerImplInternal
    Implements the internal behavior of ExoPlayerImpl.
    ExoPlayerImplInternal.MediaPeriodHolder
    Holds a MediaPeriod with information required to play it as part of a timeline.
    ExoPlayerImplInternal.MediaSourceRefreshInfo  
    ExoPlayerImplInternal.SeekPosition  
    ExoPlayerLibraryInfo
    Information about the ExoPlayer library.
    ExoPlayerTest
    Unit test for ExoPlayer.
    Format
    Representation of a media format.
    FormatHolder
    Holds a Format.
    FormatTest
    Unit test for Format.
    MediaPeriodInfoSequence
    Provides a sequence of MediaPeriodInfoSequence.MediaPeriodInfos to the player, determining the order and start/end positions for MediaPeriods to load and play.
    MediaPeriodInfoSequence.MediaPeriodInfo
    Stores the information required to load and play a MediaPeriod.
    NoSampleRenderer
    A Renderer implementation whose track type is C.TRACK_TYPE_NONE and does not consume data from its SampleStream.
    PlaybackInfo
    Information about an ongoing playback.
    PlaybackParameters
    The parameters that apply to playback.
    Player.DefaultEventListener
    Player.EventListener allowing selective overrides.
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    RendererConfiguration
    The configuration of a Renderer.
    SimpleExoPlayer
    An ExoPlayer implementation that uses default Renderer components.
    Timeline
    A flexible representation of the structure of media.
    Timeline.Period
    Holds information about a period in a Timeline.
    Timeline.Window
    Holds information about a window in a Timeline.
    TimelineTest
    Unit test for Timeline.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExoPlaybackException
    Thrown when a non-recoverable playback failure occurs.
    IllegalSeekPositionException
    Thrown when an attempt is made to seek to a position that does not exist in the player's Timeline.
    ParserException
    Thrown when an error occurs parsing media data and metadata.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    C.AudioContentType
    Content types for AudioAttributes.
    C.AudioFlags
    Flags for AudioAttributes.
    C.AudioUsage
    Usage types for AudioAttributes.
    C.BufferFlags
    Flags which can apply to a buffer containing a media sample.
    C.ColorRange
    Video color range.
    C.ColorSpace
    Video colorspaces.
    C.ColorTransfer
    Video color transfer characteristics.
    C.ContentType
    Represents a streaming or other media type.
    C.CryptoMode
    Crypto modes for a codec.
    C.Encoding
    Represents an audio encoding, or an invalid or unset value.
    C.PcmEncoding
    Represents a PCM audio encoding, or an invalid or unset value.
    C.SelectionFlags
    Track selection flags.
    C.StereoMode
    The stereo mode for 360/3D/VR videos.
    C.StreamType
    Stream types for an AudioTrack.
    C.VideoScalingMode
    Video scaling modes for MediaCodec-based Renderers.
    DefaultRenderersFactory.ExtensionRendererMode
    Modes for using extension renderers.
    ExoPlaybackException.Type
    The type of source that produced the error.
    Player.DiscontinuityReason
    Reasons for position discontinuities.
    Player.RepeatMode
    Repeat modes for playback.
